sourcesContent:
Eventos

# imagem Tema Local Data Qtd Pessoas Lote Opçoes
{{evento.eventoId}} {{evento.tema}} {{evento.local}} {{evento.dataEvento}} {{evento.qtdPessoas}} {{evento.lote}}
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any = []; widthing: number = 50; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void{ this.eventos = this.http.get('https://localhost:7250/eventos').subscribe( (response) => { console.log(JSON.stringify(response)); this.eventos = response; }, error => console.log(error) ); } }
